execution_plan.description: Find all order_item_id values that have been shipped (shipment exists and shipment_date is not null).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT si.order_item_id FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE s.shipment_date IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Get product_id for the ordered items identified as shipped in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, product_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product name and color for the product_ids found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_color FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
